sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO C_OPINION ( username,phone, certName, type, content, sfId,createDate ,fileKey,certCode,fileName, busiCode,status,active ) VALUES ( #username#, #phone#, #certName#, #type#, #content#, #sfId#, now() ,#fileKey#,#certCode#,#fileName# ,#busiCode#,#status#,#active# )
select last_insert_id() as id
sqlMap.update: UPDATE C_OPINION SET status=#status#, memo = #memo#, excuteKey = #excuteKey# WHERE id =#id#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE C_OPINION SET active = 0 WHERE id =#id#
